duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for the company’s entire financial operations and plant accounting oversight.
Participate in month-end and year-end financial closing process and reporting.
Ensure internal controls are appropriately designed and operating effectively.
Understand federal, state, and local tax requirements and related issues.
Review reconciliations and analyze general ledger accounts.
Provide functional expertise and guidance for various software applications.
Assist in the preparation of income statement forecasts and explain variances to plan and re-forecast.
Assist in the development of accounting staff by coaching and mentoring employees.
Work closely with the Plant Manager to review the performance of the operation and assist in the implementation of corrective actions.
Provide relevant information to the Corporate Office to assist in decision making.
Report company’s financial and operational results to Director of Finance.
Develop reports and indicators to track the performance of the facility.

education_certification.credential: BS in Accounting or Finance–CPA or CMA strongly preferred
